pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatially Varying and Spatio-Temporal Dynamic Linear Models // Fits, spatially predicts, and temporally forecasts space-time data using Gaussian Process (GP): (1) spatially varying coefficient process models and (2) spatio-temporal dynamic linear models. Bakar et al., (2016) doi:10.1080/00949655.2015.1038267. Bakar et al., (2015) doi:10.1111/rssc.12103.
